unnormalised: Pradhan Mantri Poshan Shakti Nirman (PM POSHAN) provides 1 hot cooked meal to children in Govt. & Govt. aided schools from Classes I-VIII; more info on eligibility can be found at pib.nic.in. The scheme was launched on 29/09/2021.
normalised: Pradhan Mantri Poshan Shakti Nirman (P-M P-O-S-H-A-N) provides one hot cooked meal to children in Government and Government aided schools from Classes one to eight; more info on eligibility can be found at p-i-b dot n-i-c dot in. The scheme was launched on twenty ninth september two thousand and twenty one.
